Docs.summary: A legacy namespace, currently containing class .
Docs.remarks: In .NET Framework this namespace used to contains classes and interfaces that enabled browser-server communication, including the class, which provided extensive information about the current HTTP request; the class, which manages HTTP output to the client; and the class, which provides access to server-side utilities and processes. also included classes for cookie manipulation, file transfer, exception information, and output cache control. Links in this section will take you to old documentation.
